_description: Fragment of work (song?) on Hector and Helen, or the Siege of Troy — four lines

OxfExe129.Transcription:
Amoungest the Trogiance alleHector he did excellAs Helen with
                    the GrecianceFor Beytie bare the Bell
OxfExe129.Note:
Added by a later hand (early sixteenth century) to last leaf of
                    manuscript.
OxfExe129.Editions:
Watson,  Andrew G.,
                        ed.  
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Medieval Manuscripts of Exeter College,
                Oxford.
         Oxford: Oxford University Press, 2000: 113.
